        z coordinate of the block ray traced against

      • sideHit

        public int sideHit
        Which side was hit. If its -1 then it went the full length of the ray trace. Bottom = 0, Top = 1, East = 2, West = 3, North = 4, South = 5.

      • hitVec

        public Vec3 hitVec
        The vector position of the hit
